titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. William Dent, G. Brown, and W. D. C. Johnson, Indictment
CWG7607

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
McCracken Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against
Wm Dent, G Brown W D C Johnson

The Grand Jury of McCracken county the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, accuse Wm Dent, G Brown & W D C Johnson of the offense of assault & Battery committed as follows viz The said Dent Brown & Johnson did on the 15th day of April 1863, in the county aforesaid, maliciously assaulted, beat, Maltreated & scandalously & cruelly abused Wm H Bristow against the Peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

P D Yeiser
Commonwealths attorney for 1st Judicial District

Witnesses
Wm H Bristow
J H Rollins
Wils Foster
Erik Rollins
Wm Duchey
J S Potter

A Copy --
attest B Small C M c c
If this be true then "truth is stranger than fiction"

Comlth
vs } A & B
Wm Dent & others

A true bill
N Stanley
Foreman
